  3. AI and the Future of National Security  National Security Agency
  4. AI and Advanced Technologies in the Fight: Combatant Command and Service Collaboration  CSIS | Center for Strategic and International Studies
  5. How AI Is Used In War Today  Forbes

item.title: Alibaba’s Taobao shopping app launches AI-powered English version in Singapore, jumps to first place in Apple’s App Store - CNBC
item.description:
1. Alibaba’s Taobao shopping app launches AI-powered English version in Singapore, jumps to first place in Apple’s App Store  CNBC
  2. Singapore shoppers can now shop on Taobao’s app with English interface  The Independent
  3. Taobao Launches Beta English Interface To Enhance Shopping Experience For All Malaysians  BERNAMA
  4. Is Taobao in English easy to use by us Malaysians? My Labubu says yes  Yahoo News Malaysia
